title: Malala Yousafzai on Helping Refugee Girls with "We Are Displaced" & Malala Fund in 2019
itunes:title: Malala Yousafzai on Helping Refugee Girls with "We Are Displaced" & Malala Fund in 2019
description:
Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai discusses her book "We Are Displaced" and explains why her nonprofit Malala Fund is focused on education. Originally aired January 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
